returns._0: stakingToken the staking token of the withdraw request manager
withdrawToken the withdraw token of the withdraw request manager
yieldToken the yield token of the withdraw request manager

params.requestId: the request id of the withdraw request

returns._0: canFinalize whether the withdraw request can be finalized

params.account: the account to finalize and redeem the withdraw request for
params.sharesToBurn: the amount of shares to burn for the yield token
params.withdrawYieldTokenAmount: the amount of yield tokens to withdraw

returns.finalized: whether the withdraw request was finalized
returns.tokensWithdrawn: amount of withdraw tokens redeemed from the withdraw requests

finalizeRequestManual(address,address).details: No access control is enforced on this function but no tokens are transferred off the request manager either.

params.account: the account to get the withdraw request for
params.vault: the vault to get the withdraw request for

params.account: the account to get the withdraw request for
params.asset: the asset to get the value for
params.shares: the amount of shares to get the value for
params.vault: the vault to get the withdraw request for

returns.hasRequest: whether the account has a withdraw request
returns.value: the value of the withdraw request in terms of the asset

initiateWithdraw(address,uint256,uint256.details: Only approved vaults can initiate withdraw requests

params.account: the account to initiate the withdraw request for
params.data: additional data for the withdraw request
params.sharesAmount: the amount of shares to withdraw, used to mark the shares to yield token ratio at the time of the withdraw request
params.yieldTokenAmount: the amount of yield tokens to withdraw

returns.requestId: the request id of the withdraw request

params.vault: the vault to check the approval for

returns._0: isApproved whether the vault is approved

params.account: the account to check the pending withdraw request for
params.vault: the vault to check the pending withdraw request for

returns._0: isPending whether the vault has a pending withdraw request

params.amount: the amount of tokens to rescue
params.cooldownHolder: the cooldown holder to rescue tokens from
params.receiver: the receiver of the rescued tokens

params.vault: the vault to set the approval for

stakeTokens(address,uint256,bytes).details: Only approved vaults can stake tokens

params.amount: the amount of tokens to stake
params.depositToken: the token to stake, will be transferred from the vault

tokenizeWithdrawRequest(address,address,.details: Only approved vaults can tokenize withdraw requests

params.from: the account that is being liquidated
params.sharesAmount: the amount of shares to the liquidator

STAKING_TOKEN().notice: Returns the token that will be used to stake

WITHDRAW_TOKEN().notice: Returns the token that will be the result of the withdraw request

YIELD_TOKEN().notice: Returns the token that will be the result of staking

canFinalizeWithdrawRequest(uint256).notice: Returns whether a withdraw request can be finalized

finalizeAndRedeemWithdrawRequest(address.notice: Attempts to redeem active withdraw requests during vault exit

finalizeRequestManual(address,address).notice: Finalizes withdraw requests outside of a vault exit. This may be required in cases if an account is negligent in exiting their vault position and letting the withdraw request sit idle could result in losses. The withdraw request is finalized and stored in a tokenized withdraw request where the account has the full claim on the withdraw.

getWithdrawRequest(address,address).notice: Returns the withdraw request and tokenized withdraw request for an account

getWithdrawRequestValue(address,address,.notice: Returns the value of a withdraw request in terms of the asset

isApprovedVault(address).notice: Returns whether a vault is approved to initiate withdraw requests

isPendingWithdrawRequest(address,address.notice: Returns whether a vault has a pending withdraw request

rescueTokens(address,address,address,uin.notice: Allows the emergency exit role to rescue tokens from the withdraw request manager

setApprovedVault(address,bool).notice: Sets whether a vault is approved to initiate withdraw requests

stakeTokens(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Stakes the deposit token to the yield token and transfers it back to the vault

tokenizeWithdrawRequest(address,address,.notice: If an account has an illiquid withdraw request, this method will tokenize their claim on it during liquidation.
